title: nammakanE
sahitya:
nammaka nE mOsa bOdunaTarA naTarAja vinuta



caraNam 1



 durviSayambulu manasuna dUraka cEsE ninu nEra

   

caraNam 2



 dhana tanaya kaLatrAdulu tamadani buddhiyani ninu

   

caraNam 3



 bommariNDlu gAni nera nammaka bhAvamunuyanu ninu

   

caraNam 4



 nemmadi lEni janaja maraNamula tolagincE ninu

   

caraNam 5



 indriyamula khalada miccE rUpamugala ninu

   

caraNam 6



 raghukula ratnamA tyAgarAjArcita padayuga ninu
